title: codehtcmail
author: codehtcmail
content: Is Apeswap (BANANA) from the same team of Apecoin ? anyone heard of it before ?

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on February 12, 2023, 11:42:06 AMIs Apeswap (BANANA) from the same team of Apecoin ? anyone heard of it before ?Apeswap was created during a trend of DeFi 2.0 two years ago. The project has an announcement thread in Bitcointalk as well.üçåüçå [ANN] ApeSwap | The next-gen AMM, Staking and Farming Protocol on BSC üçåüçåI am sure with you that they are not from Apecoin team. No relation between two projects.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on February 12, 2023, 11:42:06 AMIs Apeswap (BANANA) from the same team of Apecoin ? anyone heard of it before ?I joined Apeswap signature campaign when it took it's release and advertisement in this forum and it is far different from Apecoin. Apecoin developers are Ape Foundations which faciliatate Apecoin and it is under Yuga Labs who a we3 company which created the famous Bored Ape Yacht Club. Apeswap.finance who's native token is Banana is different from apecoin. Apeswap is more focus on Defi where Apecoin focuses on web3 technology. Apecoin is definitely has a lot more support from the community given that it made a very successful launch and it's coin value being supported and not falling too deep.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: abel1337 on February 13, 2023, 09:16:35 PMit is far different from Apecoin. Apecoin developers are Ape Foundations which faciliatate Apecoin and it is under Yuga Labs who a we3 company which created the famous Bored Ape Yacht Club. Apeswap.finance who's native token is Banana is different from apecoin.Many projects have Ape in their project names and token names but it does not mean those projects are related with each other by team members or project developments. Like with Bitcoin, there are hundreds of Bitcoin forks and they usually name their projects and coin names with Bitcoin as part of their names like Bitcoin Cash, Bitcoin SV, Bitcoin Gold ... However, it is wrong to say Bitcoin has any relation with them about team members, developers or any other things.QuoteApeswap is more focus on Defi where Apecoin focuses on web3 technology. Apecoin is definitely has a lot more support from the community given that it made a very successful launch and it's coin value being supported and not falling too deep. Apeswap is a DeFi project and if OP want to know more about them and what's going on recently with their project development, marketing, join their Telegram group and ask questions.Get links to their communities on Coinmarketcap https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/apeswap-finance/

comments.author: redsun114
comments.body: Quote from: abel1337 on February 13, 2023, 09:16:35 PMQuote from: codehtcmail on February 12, 2023, 11:42:06 AMIs Apeswap (BANANA) from the same team of Apecoin ? anyone heard of it before ?I joined Apeswap signature campaign when it took it's release and advertisement in this forum and it is far different from Apecoin. Apecoin developers are Ape Foundations which faciliatate Apecoin and it is under Yuga Labs who a we3 company which created the famous Bored Ape Yacht Club. Apeswap.finance who's native token is Banana is different from apecoin. Apeswap is more focus on Defi where Apecoin focuses on web3 technology. Apecoin is definitely has a lot more support from the community given that it made a very successful launch and it's coin value being supported and not falling too deep. I think defi and web 3 have some similarities because when we use defi, we are being asked to connect our web 3 wallets but I am not saying that both of the ape projects are the same. You already explained on why they are different and even before, I am already aware that they are not the same even though their names are almost identical to each other.Apeswap was once famous during its release but I guess that's just how it works, that the longer the project exists, the more it becomes less popular and favoured by the masses. Apecoin is much newer than the apeswap so it was still hot in the public right now but its time can also come soon.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on February 12, 2023, 11:42:06 AMIs Apeswap (BANANA) from the same team of Apecoin ? anyone heard of it before ?It's different mate. BANANA was a token that being released by apeswap.finance team. https://apeswap.finance/You may see that if it's almost pretty similar in the name but it's very different compared with ape token released for Bored Ape Yacht Club token holders. Ape token related to the BAYC NFT has a purpose to be used on the metaverse that being developed by yugo labs. Both of tokens have different purposes and it's developed by different entities. i heard it and you must be careful by checking the site. BANANA token (apeswap) didn't have relationshp with Ape token by BAYC NFT created by yugo labs.

comments.author: Ludmilla_rose1995
comments.created_time: February 19, 2023, 08:30:04 AMLast edit: February 19, 2023, 10:06:09 AM by Ludmilla_rose1995
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on February 12, 2023, 11:42:06 AMIs Apeswap (BANANA) from the same team of Apecoin ? anyone heard of it before ?As far as I know, these two projects are not related at all, and what circulated for the first time was that Apeswap even had their campaign handled by hhampuz, while apecoin is a token issued by the ape NFT community (BAYC).

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: No its different team I joined Apeswap couple years ago when hhampuz have bounty. Its Decentralized Exchange on Binance smart chain like pancakeswap although now its on couple of join the team also good¬† . But Apecoin managed by BAYC team

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on February 12, 2023, 11:42:06 AMIs Apeswap (BANANA) from the same team of Apecoin ? anyone heard of it before ?As a rule of thumb you can presume that when there are several different coins or tokens with similar or same name or same ticker, they have nothing to do with each other. There are only so many themes and names before they run out and people have to reuse them. Assuming that names have a connection will just make you do bad investments. "Ape" is not a protected brand, "Planet of the Apes" is.

comments.author: sana54210
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on March 02, 2023, 11:34:07 AMQuote from: codehtcmail on February 12, 2023, 11:42:06 AMIs Apeswap (BANANA) from the same team of Apecoin ? anyone heard of it before ?As a rule of thumb you can presume that when there are several different coins or tokens with similar or same name or same ticker, they have nothing to do with each other. There are only so many themes and names before they run out and people have to reuse them. Assuming that names have a connection will just make you do bad investments. "Ape" is not a protected brand, "Planet of the Apes" is.I would guess that even though it has nothing to do with each other, the hype they are trying to rob off from is the same thing. We are all "apes" and that is why it's called ape here as well as anywhere else as well. The meme that we are "aping" or just accepting that we ape into these things and just accepting the non-informative ways and just disrupting the normal financial system by being out of the box, all of these are wrong things.You can make a bit of a profit here and there, some people could even get rich, but it is not a long term solution and can't make anyone have a retirement fund with this method, you gotta do something a little bit more legit.
